attr.obj: unit of electric charge (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of electric charge measure)

concept.name: electric potential [Entity] (The electric potential is the amount of work energy needed to move a unit of electric charge from a reference point to the specific point in an electric field with negligible acceleration of the test charge to avoid producing kinetic energy or radiation by test charge.)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of electric potential (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of electric potential measure)

concept.name: capacitance [Entity] (Capacitance is the ratio of the amount of electric charge stored on a conductor to a difference in electric potential)

attr.obj: unit of capacitance (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of capacitance measure)

concept.name: electric conductance [Entity] (Electrical conductance measures how easily electricity flows through electrical components for a given voltage difference.)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of electric conductance (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of electric conductance measure)

concept.name: magnetic flux [Entity] (Magnetic flux is a measurement of the total magnetic field which passes through a given area.)

attr.obj: unit of magnetic flux (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of magnetic flux measure)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of magnetic flux density (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of magnetic flux density measure)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of inductance (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of inductance measure)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of celsius temperature (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of celsius temperature measure)

concept.name: luminous flux [Entity] (Luminous flux is the measure of brightness of a light source in terms of energy being emitted.)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of luminous flux (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of luminous flux measure)

concept.name: absorbed dose [Entity] (Absorbed dose is a dose quantity which is the measure of the energy deposited in matter by ionizing radiation per unit mass.)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of absorbed dose (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of absorbed dose measure)

concept.name: dose equivalent [Entity] (Equivalent dose is a dose quantity H representing the stochastic health effects of low levels of ionizing radiation on the human body which represents the probability of radiation-induced cancer and genetic damage.)

attr.rel: be measured by unit ((about physical quantity) to be measured by unit of measure)
attr.obj: unit of dose equivalent (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of dose equivalent measure)
